vfsCore

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • vfsCore.Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The Core is the most important part of our VFS implementation. It is responsible for providing an access to any operation the user might want to do on the VFS disk currently loaded. It is the main operating class, providing a link between the logical layer (Hierarchy) and the physical one (through CoreIo and CoreImportExport).
    Author:
    simon

        create a VFS disk at the specified path on the host system, with the specified size for the data partition

        size - the size of the VFS data partition, in kilobytes
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful
